title: KESR Bespoke WEB_SessionAvailability & WEB_SessionCalendar
text: This is KESR's bespoke WEB_SessionAvailability & WEB_SessionCalendar that allows customers to view available sessions up to 550 days in advance. In both scripts; Replace this: DECLARE @FDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, @FromDateTime, 113) ,@TDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, @ToDateTime, 113) ,@filterType int If @FDateTime = @TDateTime With this: DECLARE @FDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, @FromDateTime, 113) ,@TDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, DATEADD(DAY,550,@FromDateTime), 113) ,@filterType int If @FDateTime = @TDateTime
description:
This is KESR's bespoke WEB_SessionAvailability & WEB_SessionCalendar that allows customers to view available sessions up to 550 days in advance.



In both scripts;


Replace this:

DECLARE @FDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, @FromDateTime, 113)
       ,@TDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, @ToDateTime, 113)
       ,@filterType int 
If @FDateTime =  @TDateTime

With this:

DECLARE @FDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, @FromDateTime, 113)
       ,@TDateTime AS DATETIME = CONVERT(DATETIME, DATEADD(DAY,550,@FromDateTime), 113)
       ,@filterType int 
If @FDateTime =  @TDateTime
